full_summary:
### Purchase of one (1) Microtox LX Analyzer

#### Tender Reference
* **Reference Number (numéro de référence)**: PW-22-01010100
* **Amendment Number (numéro de modification)**: 1
* **Solicitation Number (numéro de sollicitation)**: 01B46-22-093

#### Tender Period
* **Publication Date (date de publication)**: 2022-10-17
* **Tender Closing Date (date limite de soumission)**: 2022-11-28T14:00:00

#### Project Details
* **Expected Contract Start Date (date de début du contrat prévue)**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date (date de fin du contrat prévue)**: None

#### Tender Category and Description
* **Tender Category (catégorie de l'appel d'offre) / Procurement Category (categorización de la compra)**: *Laboratory and Scientific Equipment*
* **Trade Agreement (accord commercial)**: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*
* **Procurement Method (méthode d'approvisionnement)**: *Competitive - Open Bidding (concurrentiel - invitation ouverte à soumissionner)*

#### Eligible Suppliers
* **Eligible Suppliers (fournisseurs autorisés)**: Suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI are eligible to bid.

#### Important Notice
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is reserved for holders of the Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI only.

#### Contact Information
* **Name (Nom)**: Jacques Toussaint
* **Email (Courriel)**: jacques.toussaint@canada.ca
* **Address (Adresse)**: 2001 Boulevard Robert-Bourassa, Piece 671 Montréal, QC H3A 3N2

#### Tender Documents
The RFP document is available at: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/17/db83a8651d1a757d0c8ab402944b57b6/npp-_e60pv-19equi.pdf> (English) and <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/17/6ad8351f4596eaf58efbe44643e8
